deepair.desc: Warning: Passing 500 meters. Extreme environmental pressure detected. Oxygen consumption at maximum tolerable level.

lrpoison.desc: Emergency: Chemical trauma imminent. Evacuate this region immediately, or fabricate chemical shielding.

voidspikeenter.desc: Short-range scans show an abundance of suspended land masses in the region below. Detecting unknown mineral deposits.

aurorafire.desc: Caution: Hazardous fire levels detected. The radiation suit is not equipped for this environment.

underislandgeyserminerals.desc: Detecting intense volcanic activity on the seafloor in this region, resulting in high concentrations of mineral resources.

kelpcavedrone.desc: Detecting Alterra fabricator vehicle signatures in a nearby cave system, depth 80 meters. Caution is strongly advised around local volcanic activity.

kelpcavedronelate.desc: Detecting technological artifacts in the vicinity of lifepod 3. Further exploration is recommended.

redgrasscave.desc: Scans indicate biological specimens in this cave system which may be used to synthesize new chemical materials.

kooshcave.desc: The local caves appear to contain high concentrations of unusual metal deposits.

sanctuaryprompt.desc: Detecting unknown ecological signature in the region, and possibly unique lifeforms. It is imperative that you acquire live specimens before radiation levels make survival unlikely.

treaderpoo.desc: Unsavory biological materials may still be used for survival purposes.

dunearch.desc: Unknown radio transmission detected in the region. Unable to identify lifepod signature. Outputting results to databank.

followradio.desc: Exploration of radio transmissions originating from the Aurora's survivors may provide technologies and help ensure survival.

needlaunchcargo.desc: Further cargo required: Bring onboard research specimens to Alterra.

unfinishedexplore.desc: Cannot launch rocket. Your exploration of this region is incomplete. Please refer to the databank for further information.

notseenallbiomes.desc: Detecting multiple unexplored ecological biomes. Your primary research task is to acquire further information.

bulkheadLaserCutterUpgrade.name: Laser Cutter Temperature Upgrade
bulkheadLaserCutterUpgrade.pda: Can now also cut reinforced titanium plating
bulkheadLaserCutterUpgrade.error: Reinforced bulkheads require increased cutting temperatures

bioprocessorBoost.name: Bioprocessor Efficiency Upgrade
bioprocessorBoost.pda: Now completes recipes with 33% less energy required

DockToChangeVehicleUpgrades.desc: Vehicle upgrades can only be exchanged while docked

ItemNotDroppable.desc: This item can be stored but cannot be dropped.

PrawnBayDoorHeatWarn.desc: WARNING: Extreme temperatures on the other side of this doorway

CampfireClick.desc: Supply a raw fish to smoke

MercuryDesc.desc: Mercury is a valuable constituent of advanced circuit fabrication, and its oxide is useful as a red dye.
MercuryDesc.pda:
A rare ore, formed of mercury oxides. Aside from centuries of history of being used directly as a red dye, the mercury content can be extracted and reprocessed into advanced electronic systems.
Assessment: Essential for advanced fabrication
